casebody.data:
SEA RANCH OWNERS ASSO.
v.
Sea RANCH. No. 338P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 26, 2006. Alyssa M. Chen, William S. Hoyle, for Sea Ranch Owners Assoc. Steven C. Frucci, Virginia Beach, VA, Bradford J. Lingg, for Sea Ranch II, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2006 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of June 2006."
